markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual Energy Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=2902) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Energy Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=2888)

</column>

---

A second energy dwells in your eidolon. Choose an additional energy damage type. Your unarmed attack that deals energy damage gains the [versatile](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait for the second energy damage type, and your eidolon gains resistance to the second type of energy damage equal to half your level.
name: Dual Energy Heart

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Dual Energy Heart Source Secrets of Magic pg. 69 1.1 Prerequisites Energy Heart --- A second energy dwells in your eidolon. Choose an additional energy damage type. Your unarmed attack that deals energy damage gains the versatile trait for the second energy damage type, and your eidolon gains resistance to the second type of energy damage equal to half your level.
